Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/admin/su

../                      Parent directory
!INDEX.html              Long index format
root1.2.tar.gz           a clone of sudo that allows temporary root to users in subscription file
su1-4.2.tgz              allows selected users to run root programs
sudo-1.2-shadow.tgz      lets users run commands as root w/ shadow support
super-3.7.2.linux.tar.gz suid program that restricts access to suid programs
usershutdown-1.1.tar.gz  allows selected users, controlled by a file in /etc, to shut down the system
